post.author: K. Kwon
post.content:
We would like to cordially invite you to meet with us. ATI's Recruiting Roadshow offers job seekers and hiring managers the opportunity to meet in person to explore career opportunities.



Toronto
Saturday November 15th, 2003
12:00pm - 4:00pm
ATI Headquarters, 1 Commerce Valley

http://www.ati.com/companyinfo/careers/recruit.html
post.title: Explore Career Opportunities at ATI
